entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning late this afternoon. 30 percent chance of showers over northern sections this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
